footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, effects, and sacred tradition of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find out how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, spiritual content, and much more. Join our healing community!
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral sacred beverage from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, it has been used by indigenous peoples for healing, self-knowledge, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The beverage induces a modified state of consciousness that allows access to deep levels of the mind. During this process, it is common to have visions, release repressed emotions, and gain a deeper understanding of oneself and the universe. It is a tool for cleansing the body, mind, and spirit.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: It is crucial to understand that Ayahuasca is not a recreational substance. It is a master plant that teaches, heals, and guides. Its use should always be in a ceremonial context, respected, and guided by experienced facilitators who can ensure a safe and contained environment for the transformative process.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps release emotional blockages, overcome fears, and find answers to deep personal questions.
benefitClarityDescription: It helps release emotional blockages, overcome fears, and find answers to deep personal questions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Many people report improvement in physical ailments and a profound sense of spiritual cleansing and reconnection.
benefitHealingDescription: Many people report improvement in physical ailments and a profound sense of spiritual cleansing and reconnection.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and fosters a sense of unity with nature, the universe, and all beings.
benefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and fosters a sense of unity with nature, the universe, and all beings.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies are the most traditional way to experience Ayahuasca. The collective energy of the group creates a powerful support and containment field, where shared experiences enrich each individual's personal process. It is an opportunity to heal in community, guided by facilitators who sustain the sacred space.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies. These sessions are designed to address specific themes in-depth, with the exclusive dedication of the guide. It is an ideal space for those who need a more contained and focused environment for their healing.
guidesPageSubtitle: Experienced facilitators dedicated to your healing and transformation. With deep respect for ancestral traditions, our team is here to accompany you with care, professionalism, and love on your inner journey.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for healing and transformation. Discover the one that resonates with you.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the ceremony. Changes will be visible to everyone.
addCeremonyDescription: Create a new ceremony. It will be visible to all users once saved.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: The event has been moved to the past ceremonies section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from non-admin users. Are you sure?
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the home page.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage, and communicate with all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users in the system.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the user's answers to the medical questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the predefined WhatsApp messages to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
themeCustomizationDescription: Modify the application's color palette. The changes will be applied in real-time.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file with all Firestore data.
importDataDescription: Import data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action is irreversible. It will overwrite all current data in the database with the data from the selected file. A backup of the current state will be automatically created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been imported and overwritten.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can restore it if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will overwrite the current data with the data from the automatic backup created before the last import. Are you sure you want to continue?
rollbackSuccessDescription: The previous data has been restored.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide bot.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been started yet.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your healing path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review and manage system-generated error logs.
systemLogsDescription: Here are the errors that have occurred in the application.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this log entry?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your journey.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication? (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, etc.)
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, etc.)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychedelic substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. We are excited to accompany you on this transformative journey. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here are the answers you submitted.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: A complete guide to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a deep and safe experience with ancestral medicine.
preparationProcessDescription: We accompany you from preparation to integration.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A safe space for your inner exploration.
experienceProcessDescription: Profound connection and release of blockages.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you apply the teachings in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet is essential to prepare your body and allow the medicine to work deeply.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables. Legumes and grains like lentils, chickpeas, and quinoa. White meats like chicken and fish (cooked simply). Natural infusions and plenty of water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat and pork. Fermented foods (aged cheese, soy). Citrus and very ripe fruits. Alcohol, caffeine, and sugary drinks. Spicy, fried, or processed foods.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Align your mind and spirit with your intention for this sacred process.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly reflect on what you want to heal or understand. Write it down if necessary.
reflectionDescription: Dedicate time to be with yourself, write down your thoughts and emotions.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. The key is to trust, let go, and allow the medicine to guide you. Our team will be there to support you at all times, creating a safe and loving container for your process. Remember that everything that emerges is part of your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, warm clothing (preferably light colors). A blanket or sleeping bag. A pillow or cushion. A change of clothes for the next day.
essentialsList: A bottle of water. A notebook and pen for your notes. A flashlight (with a red light if possible). Personal hygiene items.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or create an account to view our guides and prepare for your ceremony.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Sign in or create an account to view our upcoming ceremonies and reserve your spot.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not yet assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events and reserve your spot!
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies you want to assign to this user. They will appear in their 'My Ceremonies' section.
noActiveCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies to assign.
analyticsDescription: Track user interaction with different sections of the homepage.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view, reserve, and WhatsApp click counts for this ceremony to zero. Are you sure?
